24 template <class OutputIterator, class Iterator>
25 double toNormalForm(OutputIterator& out, const Iterator & begin, const Iterator & end){
26  //determine the maximum
27  double lmax = -std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
28  for (Iterator it=begin; it!=end; it++){
29  lmax=lmax>((double)(*it))? lmax: (double)(*it);
30  }
31  //convert to raw form
32  for (Iterator it=begin; it!=end; it++){
33  *out=exp((double)(*it)-lmax);
34  out++;
35  }
36  return lmax;
37 }
38 
39 template <class OutputIterator, class Iterator, class Numeric>
40 void toLogForm(OutputIterator& out, const Iterator & begin, const Iterator & end, Numeric lmax){
41  //determine the maximum
42  for (Iterator it=begin; it!=end; it++){
43  *out=log((Numeric)(*it))-lmax;
44  out++;
45  }
46  return lmax;
47 }

49 template <class WeightVector>
50 void resample(std::vector<int>& indexes, const WeightVector& weights, unsigned int nparticles=0){
51  double cweight=0;
52 
53  //compute the cumulative weights
54  unsigned int n=0;
55  for (typename WeightVector::const_iterator it=weights.begin(); it!=weights.end(); ++it){
56  cweight+=(double)*it;
57  n++;
58  }
59 
60  if (nparticles>0)
61  n=nparticles;
62 
63  //compute the interval
64  double interval=cweight/n;
65 
66  //compute the initial target weight
67  double target=interval*::drand48();
68  //compute the resampled indexes
69 
70  cweight=0;
71  indexes.resize(n);
72 
73  n=0;
74  unsigned int i=0;
75  for (typename WeightVector::const_iterator it=weights.begin(); it!=weights.end(); ++it, ++i){
76  cweight+=(double)* it;
77  while(cweight>target){
78  indexes[n++]=i;
79  target+=interval;
80  }
81  }
82 }

84 template <typename Vector>
85 void repeatIndexes(Vector& dest, const std::vector<int>& indexes, const Vector& particles){
86  assert(indexes.size()==particles.size());
87  dest.resize(particles.size());
88  unsigned int i=0;
89  for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator it=indexes.begin(); it!=indexes.end(); ++it){
90  dest[i]=particles[*it];
91  i++;
92  }
93 }

96 template <class Iterator>
97 double neff(const Iterator& begin, const Iterator& end){
98  double sum=0;
99  for (Iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it){
100  sum+=*it;
101  }
102  double cum=0;
103  for (Iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it){
104  double w=*it/sum;
105  cum+=w*w;
106  }
107  return 1./cum;
108 }

110 template <class Iterator>
111 void normalize(const Iterator& begin, const Iterator& end){
112  double sum=0;
113  for (Iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it){
114  sum+=*it;
115  }
116  for (Iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it){
117  *it=*it/sum;
118  }
119 }

121 template <class OutputIterator, class Iterator>
122 void rle(OutputIterator& out, const Iterator & begin, const Iterator & end){
123  unsigned int current=0;
124  unsigned int count=0;
125  for (Iterator it=begin; it!=end; it++){
126  if (it==begin){
127  current=*it;
128  count=1;
129  continue;
130  }
131  if (((uint)*it) ==current)
132  count++;
133  if (((uint)*it)!=current){
134  *out=std::make_pair(current,count);
135  out++;
136  current=*it;
137  count=1;
138  }
139  }
140  if (count>0)
141  *out=std::make_pair(current,count);
142  out++;
143 }

146 template <class Particle, class Numeric>
147 struct uniform_resampler{
148  std::vector<unsigned int> resampleIndexes(const std::vector<Particle> & particles, int nparticles=0) const;
149  std::vector<Particle> resample(const std::vector<Particle> & particles, int nparticles=0) const;
150  Numeric neff(const std::vector<Particle> & particles) const;
151 };

153 /*Implementation of the above stuff*/
154 template <class Particle, class Numeric>
155 std::vector<unsigned int> uniform_resampler<Particle, Numeric>:: resampleIndexes(const std::vector<Particle>& particles, int nparticles) const{
156  Numeric cweight=0;
157 
158  //compute the cumulative weights
159  unsigned int n=0;
160  for (typename std::vector<Particle>::const_iterator it=particles.begin(); it!=particles.end(); ++it){
161  cweight+=(Numeric)*it;
162  n++;
163  }
164 
165  if (nparticles>0)
166  n=nparticles;
167 
168  //compute the interval
169  Numeric interval=cweight/n;
170 
171  //compute the initial target weight
172  Numeric target=interval*::drand48();
173  //compute the resampled indexes
174 
175  cweight=0;
176  std::vector<unsigned int> indexes(n);
177  n=0;
178  unsigned int i=0; //重采样的轮环
179  for (typename std::vector<Particle>::const_iterator it=particles.begin(); it!=particles.end(); ++it, ++i)
180  {
181  cweight+=(Numeric)* it;
182  while(cweight>target)
183  {
184  indexes[n++]=i;
185  target+=interval;
186  }
187  }
188  return indexes;
189 }

191 template <class Particle, class Numeric>
192 std::vector<Particle> uniform_resampler<Particle,Numeric>::resample
193  (const typename std::vector<Particle>& particles, int nparticles) const{
194  Numeric cweight=0;
195 
196  //compute the cumulative weights
197  unsigned int n=0;
198  for (typename std::vector<Particle>::const_iterator it=particles.begin(); it!=particles.end(); ++it){
199  cweight+=(Numeric)*it;
200  n++;
201  }
202 
203  if (nparticles>0)
204  n=nparticles;
205 
206  //weight of the particles after resampling
207  double uw=1./n;
208 
209  //compute the interval
210  Numeric interval=cweight/n;
211 
212  //compute the initial target weight
213  Numeric target=interval*::drand48();
214  //compute the resampled indexes
215 
216  cweight=0;
217  std::vector<Particle> resampled;
218  n=0;
219  unsigned int i=0;
220  for (typename std::vector<Particle>::const_iterator it=particles.begin(); it!=particles.end(); ++it, ++i){
221  cweight+=(Numeric)*it;
222  while(cweight>target){
223  resampled.push_back(*it);
224  resampled.back().setWeight(uw);
225  target+=interval;
226  }
227  }
228  return resampled;
229 }
230 
231 template <class Particle, class Numeric>
232 Numeric uniform_resampler<Particle,Numeric>::neff(const std::vector<Particle> & particles) const{
233  double cum=0;
234  double sum=0;
235  for (typename std::vector<Particle>::const_iterator it=particles.begin(); it!=particles.end(); ++it){
236  Numeric w=(Numeric)*it;
237  cum+=w*w;
238  sum+=w;
239  }
240  return sum*sum/cum;
241 }

250 struct observer{

263 template <class Particle, class EvolutionModel>
264 struct evolver{
265  EvolutionModel evolutionModel;
266  void evolve(std::vector<Particle>& particles);
267  void evolve(std::vector<Particle>& dest, const std::vector<Particle>& src);
268 };
269 
270 template <class Particle, class EvolutionModel>
271 void evolver<Particle, EvolutionModel>::evolve(std::vector<Particle>& particles){
272  for (typename std::vector<Particle>::iterator it=particles.begin(); it!=particles.end(); ++it){
273  *it=evolutionModel.evolve(*it);
274  }
275 }
276 
277 template <class Particle, class EvolutionModel>
278 void evolver<Particle, EvolutionModel>::evolve(std::vector<Particle>& dest, const std::vector<Particle>& src){
279  dest.clear();
280  for (typename std::vector<Particle>::const_iterator it=src.begin(); it!=src.end(); ++it)
281  dest.push_back(evolutionModel.evolve(*it));
282 }

285 template <class Particle, class Numeric, class QualificationModel, class EvolutionModel, class LikelyhoodModel>
286 struct auxiliary_evolver{
287  EvolutionModel evolutionModel;
288  QualificationModel qualificationModel;
289  LikelyhoodModel likelyhoodModel;
290  void evolve(std::vector<Particle>& particles);
291  void evolve(std::vector<Particle>& dest, const std::vector<Particle>& src);
292 };
293 
294 template <class Particle, class Numeric, class QualificationModel, class EvolutionModel, class LikelyhoodModel>
295 void auxiliary_evolver<Particle, Numeric, QualificationModel, EvolutionModel, LikelyhoodModel>::evolve
296  (std::vector<Particle>&particles){
297  std::vector<Numeric> observationWeights(particles.size());
298  unsigned int i=0;
299  for (typename std::vector<Particle>::const_iterator it=particles.begin(); it!=particles.end(); ++it, i++){
300  observationWeights[i]=likelyhoodModel.likelyhood(qualificationModel.evolve(*it));
301  }
302  uniform_resampler<Numeric, Numeric> resampler;
303  std::vector<unsigned int> indexes(resampler.resampleIndexes(observationWeights));
304  for (typename std::vector<unsigned int>::const_iterator it=indexes.begin(); it!=indexes.end(); ++it){
305  Particle & particle=particles[*it];
306  particle=evolutionModel.evolve(particle);
307  particle.setWeight(likelyhoodModel.likelyhood(particle)/observationWeights[*it]);
308  }
309 }
310 
311 template <class Particle, class Numeric, class QualificationModel, class EvolutionModel, class LikelyhoodModel>
312 void auxiliary_evolver<Particle, Numeric, QualificationModel, EvolutionModel, LikelyhoodModel>::evolve
313  (std::vector<Particle>& dest, const std::vector<Particle>& src){
314  dest.clear();
315  std::vector<Numeric> observationWeights(src.size());
316  unsigned int i=0;
317  for (typename std::vector<Particle>::const_iterator it=src.begin(); it!=src.end(); ++it, i++){
318  observationWeights[i]=likelyhoodModel.likelyhood(qualificationModel.evolve(*it));
319  }
320  uniform_resampler<Numeric, Numeric> resampler;
321  std::vector<unsigned int> indexes(resampler.resampleIndexes(observationWeights));
322  for (typename std::vector<unsigned int>::const_iterator it=indexes.begin(); it!=indexes.end(); ++it){
323  Particle & particle=src[*it];
324  dest.push_back(evolutionModel.evolve(particle));
325  dest.back().weight*=likelyhoodModel.likelyhood(particle)/observationWeights[*it];
326  }
327 }
